price: 48. Toysa Nabiyow atu isi Rabbih meklal isbiraay, kullumti kataysah (Nabii Yuunus kinnuk) inna makkin naqabuu kee sabri sinnah, usuk isi Rabbih qoxxitit (kaxxa faxewaynaan kinnuk) kullumti bagih addat anuk seecc waqdi.
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلۡحُوتِ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكۡظُومٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'bir liḥuk'mi rabbika walā takun kaṣāḥibi al-ḥūti idh nādā wahuwa makẓūmun
